extendedInfo.description: The ZENONIA series gets revamped and up-scaled for an epic third generation, providing even greater enjoyment than the previous two ZENONIA's combined!âââââââââââââââââââââNEW FEATURES VAST AND FASCINATING REALM OF MIDGARD227 unique maps of Midgard and 136 quests of action-packed adventure.FOUR DISTINCTIVE CLASSESMelee and range type classes to choose from; Sword Knight, Shadow Hunter, Mechanic Launcher and Nature Shaman.ADDITIONAL NETWORK MODECombat through the new Execution Room Mode dungeons in single or asynchronous co-op play.COLLECT TITLESAcquire 47 in-game titles with special character boosting effects.OUT WITH THE OLD, IN WITH THE NEWNo more weight or hunger system. New slot-based inventory management and easier item combining.âââââââââââââââââââââIMPROVED FEATURESDYNAMIC CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION 184 weapons, 120 helmets, 120 armors, 100 gauntlets and 100 footwear for maximum character customization.THREE DIFFERENT MODES WITH PVP ARENA Normal, Hard and Hell Mode plus an asynchronous online PvP arena to challenge friends.GREATER RPG EXPERIENCEOver 200 intelligent monsters, intuitive Fairy synchronization and more mini-puzzles to master.INTRIGUING EPIC STORYLINEAn immersive new tale from the world of ZENONIA. What has happened to Regret? Who is Chael? What lies in Midgard?...âââââââââââââââââââââ OTHER GAMEVIL GAMES Air PenguinBaseball SuperstarsÂ® IICartoon Wars: Gunner+ColosseumDESTINIAILLUSIA KAMI RETRO Soccer SuperstarsÂ®Touch MixZENONIAÂ® ZENONIAÂ® 2âââââââââââââââââââââ NEWS & EVENTS Website http://www.gamevil.com Facebook http://facebook.com/gamevil Twitter http://twitter.com/gamevil YouTube http://youtube.com/gamevil

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Love this game is the best rpg game it kind of reminds me of Ys cool weapons n equipment magic n is a excellent game I got all 5 games n I like All of them.
reviews.author: Jose Rosales

reviews.title: good game
reviews.comment: I think it is a good RPG game.. but, it\'s still need a lot of improve. The variety of skill,fairy\'s skill,the character,etc.. and,I think Gamevil should add party system to make the game more enjoyable..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Awesome game, good looking and easy game play

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: This game is very cool you can play it. But why when i entering updarting character my character is unknown user..

reviews.title: Sweet game
reviews.comment: Versatile character customization. Great story line 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: Epic. One of my all time favorites.. the best game of the searies better than 4 & 5 why? You can play it without internet connection.
reviews.author: Stephen Manio

reviews.title: Great when offline
reviews.comment: This is perfect if you commute as you DON\'T have to be online constantly like Zenonia 4 and 5. Try it out - I was hooked within 30 minutes!
reviews.author: Fed Uddin

reviews.title: Realy Good
reviews.comment: Easy to level! Good skill selection. Great History!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pantech
reviews.comment: That was awesome game and 5 star are offline it is finally pretty good game. The zenonia 4 and 5 are still online game I already try without wifi it didn\'t work offline.I try it
reviews.author: Ren Velasquez

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Dang awesome play. Simple yet engrossing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice, polished. Feels like a classic.
reviews.comment: Probably one of the best, most complete, games on the Droid market. I would have totally played this on the SNES back in the day. Now if only they would make the other ones free....

reviews.title: Thats great!!
reviews.comment: Well if u really are an 2d rpg lover.. you won\'t complain about the graphics.. XD nice game though..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Small but..
reviews.comment: Great game for a small file size. . The smallest file size of Zenonia Series.  EDIT** ok rating this to 1Star from 5star since i uninstalled it and now reinstalling but cant transfer in SD card
reviews.author: Jan Michael Riluao

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: This is the best game ever it has a great storyline and has a good levling system, you are acctually rewarded for bosses. I havnt played a game like this since kingdom hearts 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes the only problem.
reviews.comment: I\'ve been a fan of zenonia since the first one on the iPhone came out. It is definitely going to be a classic like Zelda. I\'m just having problems on my galaxy note 10.1. The game will crash about once every 30 minutes or so and it\'s quite annoying. And somehow, I\'ve been playing for 1,119,342 hours according to the game, when I\'ve only been playing about 7 hours.
reviews.author: Shreef Sbini

reviews.title: Buggy dpad
reviews.comment: Fix loading game moving d-pad down&right. Have to reset ui every load. It gets worse each time and stops left spell slot working.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Great graphics. Gameplay is one of the best I\'ve played but can\'t continue saved game due to messed up main menu.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Best funny and lovely dialogue. Plus the combo skill are marvelous

reviews.title: Well done !
reviews.comment: Pls update the game as I like to play RPG game but I need to play it online and only this game can be played offline as I don\'t have data plan ! So pls update this game !!
reviews.author: Tay Swee Han
